description: Natural Resources Canada (NRCAN) / Geological Survey of Canada (GSC) has a requirement to perform maintenance on a "Building Automation System" (BAS).
full_summary:
# Maintenance of Building Automation System (BAS)

## Notice Details

* **Reference Number**: PW-23-01021184
* **Solicitation Number**: 5000070755
* **Publication Date**: January 12, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: January 26, 2023, 17:00:00
* **Notice Type**: Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
* **Procurement Category**: CNST
* **Regions of Opportunity**: Canada
* **Regions of Delivery**: Alberta
* **Contracting Entity**: Natural Resources Canada
* **End User Entity**: Natural Resources Canada

## Tender Description

Natural Resources Canada (NRCAN)/ Geological Survey of Canada (GSC) requires maintenance on their Building Automation System (BAS). The scope of work includes routine maintenance and repair of the BAS. The tender documents are available for download on the Canada Buys website.

## Contact Information

* **Contact Name**: Gerald Baran
* **Email**: gbaran@nrcan-rncan.gc.ca
* **Phone**: 778-350-9373
* **Address**: 506 Burnside Road West, Victoria, BC, V8Z 1M5

## Attachments

The tender documents, including the ACAN and tender specifications, are available for download on the Canada Buys website:
* English: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/12/63869a08745cf14cd29d52d8a19eec73/169342_5000070755_acan_en_final_jan_11_2023.pdf
* French: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/12/2a377a6466444f173f2fbcae9f476835/169342_5000070755_acan_fr_final_jan_11_2023.pdf

Note: The procurement status of this tender is expired. DND is not accepting bids for this tender.
